name: Snowy Survivor
description:
Oh no! The polar bear mafia has ransacked a local village and taken a penguin named Steven back to their base. In this game, play as Steven and try to escape the mafia base. Along the way there are coins scattered around from the village that you can pick up to return. But be careful, there are some members of the polar bear mafia still around. Dodge them and the traps they've left behind in order to escape and return home as the hero of the village.

This game was made using assets from Kenney.nl and gamedevmarket.net .
